channel.title: Invisible command,if u can help me post quickly

item.title: Invisible command,if u can help me post quickly
item.dc:creator: @rawr_app rawr app
item.description:
@rawr_app wrote:

this is what mine looks like:

if (command.startsWith(“hide”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
{
sendMessage(“Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command.”);
pHead=-100;
pBeard=-100;
pTorso=-100;
pArms=-100;
pHands=-100;
pLegs=-100;
pFeet=-100;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if (command.startsWith(“show”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
{
sendMessage(“Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command.”);
pHead=3;
pBeard=19;
pTorso=19;
pArms=29;
pHands=35;
pLegs=39;
pFeet=44;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

hope this helps…

PS im using testscape so it might not work with your server[br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2007, 05:40:24 PM[/size][hr]oh yea if you dont put in a reverse command you wont be able to turn back :eek:

Read full topic
